title: Community Pitch Output
description: Structured output from the community-pitch skill. Contains a complete paid community plan with concept, platform recommendation, membership tiers, content cadence, launch plan, economics, community structure, bundling strategy, and kill criteria -- all grounded in persona data and signal scan evidence.

community_id.description: Unique identifier for this community pitch, e.g. 'community-devops-mastery-2025-01-15'

domain.description: The domain this community targets (e.g. 'DevOps education', 'cybersecurity careers')

opportunity.description: The specific opportunity from the signal scan this community addresses

overall_score.description: Average of all five dimension scores

score.description: Is the pain ongoing or one-time?

evidence.description: Specific persona data justifying this score

score.description: Do these personas want to connect with others like them?

evidence.description: Specific persona data justifying this score

score.description: Is there a professional or personal identity tied to this domain?

evidence.description: Specific persona data justifying this score

score.description: Does the knowledge in this domain change frequently?

evidence.description: Specific signal scan data justifying this score

score.description: Do these personas need external structure to follow through?

evidence.description: Specific persona data justifying this score

assessment.description: Overall assessment of community-market fit with reasoning

name.description: Community name -- instantly clear about who it is for, implies transformation

tagline.description: One-liner value prop. Formula: '[Outcome] for [specific persona] through [mechanism]'

before.description: Current painful state, in persona's language

after.description: Desired identity or capability they gain

core_promise.description: The ONE thing this community delivers better than any free alternative

positioning_against_free.description: Why someone would pay when free communities exist in this domain

rationale.description: Why this platform was selected, tied to persona needs and domain requirements

monthly_cost_to_creator.description: Monthly platform cost for the creator, e.g. '$99/mo', 'Free'

features_used.description: Specific platform features the community will use

tier_name.description: Clear, descriptive tier name (not generic Gold/Silver/Bronze)

includes.description: Specific list of what is included in this tier

target_persona.description: Which persona this tier is designed for

content_type.description: What the content is, e.g. 'weekly live Q&A', 'monthly architecture teardown', 'daily tips'

time_investment.description: Creator time per occurrence, e.g. '1 hour', '30 minutes'

value_to_member.description: Why members stay for this specifically -- the retention reason

pre_launch.description: Specific steps before opening the community (2-4 weeks before launch)

founding_member_offer.description: Special deal for first N members -- specific N, specific pricing, specific perks

launch_channels.description: Where to announce -- specific platforms, communities, and formats

first_30_days.description: What happens in month 1, week by week

growth_strategy.description: How to grow beyond the initial launch -- referrals, content marketing, partnerships, discovery

target_members_month_1.description: Realistic member count at end of month 1, based on current audience and launch plan

target_members_month_6.description: Projected member count at month 6, accounting for churn and growth

target_members_month_12.description: Projected member count at month 12, accounting for churn and growth

monthly_price.description: Monthly membership price in dollars (primary tier)

projected_mrr_month_1.description: Projected monthly recurring revenue at end of month 1

projected_mrr_month_6.description: Projected monthly recurring revenue at month 6

projected_mrr_month_12.description: Projected monthly recurring revenue at month 12

churn_assumption.description: Monthly churn rate assumption with rationale, e.g. '7-10% monthly -- standard for paid communities in this price range'

break_even_members.description: Number of members needed to cover platform costs + creator time valued at market rate

time_investment_weekly.description: Creator hours per week to maintain the community, e.g. '5-8 hours'

purpose.description: What this space is for, in one sentence

who_posts.description: Who contributes content to this space

onboarding_flow.description: Steps that happen when someone joins -- goal is to get them posting within 24 hours

engagement_mechanics.description: What keeps people active -- challenges, accountability, gamification, prompts, spotlights

retention_hooks.description: What prevents churn -- relationships, progress tracking, exclusive access, reputation, upcoming events

standalone_products.description: One-time products (from offer-scope) that bundle with or complement the community

upsell_path.description: What community members upgrade to -- coaching, mastermind, done-for-you, premium tier

downsell_path.description: What to offer when someone cancels -- lower tier, pause, one-time product, alumni channel

kill_criteria.description: Conditions under which to shut down the community -- defined before launch to prevent sunk cost fallacy

persona_ref.description: Reference to the persona-extract output file used as input

decision_ref.description: Reference to the decision-log output file used as input

signal_scan_ref.description: Reference to the signal-scan output file used as input
